author: hroskes
body:
The biggest fixes here are:
- Use the correct reference for zero APE
- Fix bugs when running multiple parallel offline validations or multiple geometry comparisons
- Load the correct magnetic field as described https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/swDevelopment/3214.html

plus fix a few other small issues

Orthogonal to #9550 and #9881
title: Backport of #10003 - Various All In One Tool bugfixes
